description: React component for instructor review management, including listing reviews, displaying review details, and handling instructor responses.

methods.name: InstructorReviews
methods.description: Main React component for managing instructor reviews, including loading reviews, handling responses, and rendering UI.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch courses and reviews data from the database.

methods.name: startRespond
methods.description: Initiates response editing for a specific review.

methods.name: submitResponse
methods.description: Saves the instructor's response to a review in the database.
